---
title: "Potential Swimming Datasets"
output: html_document
date: '2022-09-19'
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
Swim_report <- read_csv("Report.csv")
```

```{r}
Swim_report2 <-
  Swim_report %>%
  pivot_longer(.,
               cols = 1:21,
               names_to = "name",
               values_to = "values",
               values_drop_na = FALSE) %>%
  mutate(name = str_remove_all(name, "="),
         values = str_remove_all(values, "="),
         name = str_remove_all(name, "\""),
         values = str_remove_all(values, "\""))
```


```{r}
Swim_report2 %>%
  group_by(name) %>%
  count() %>%
  view()
```




```{r}
swim_report3 <-
  Swim_report2 %>% 
  slice(1:42) %>%
  pivot_wider(.,
              names_from = name,
              values_from = values) 
```
